#| echo: false
#| output: asis
if(exists("params")){
  if(!is.null(params$question_courante)){
    if(is.integer(params$question_courante)){
      if(length(params$question_courante) == 1L){
        if(params$question_courante >= 1){
          variant <- seq.int(from = 1, to = params$question_courante)
          quarto::write_yaml_metadata_block(
            .list = setNames(
              as.list(rep(TRUE, length(variant))),
              nm = sprintf("is_answer_print_%d", variant)
            )
          )
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
